<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Bugbear Tormentor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2861)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The bugbear tormentor seeks to torture their prey as much through psychological intimidation as through physical harm. The longer a bugbear tormentor can keep their victim alive and terrified, the better they feel.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Bugbear Tormentor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2861)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Bugbear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=744" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 47 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9) (2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 44

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sickle +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Sneak Attack**   The bugbear tormentor deals 1d6 extra precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.

**Twin Feint** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The bugbear tormentor makes a dazzling series of attacks with two weapons, using the first attack to throw their foe off-guard against a second attack at a different angle. They make one Strike with each of their two melee weapons, both against the same target. The target is automatically [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) against the second attack. The bugbear tormentor applies their multiple attack penalty to these Strikes normally.

</column>
